Package com.brunomnsilva.smartgraph.graphview

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SmartGraphEdge<E,V>
    A graph edge visually connects two Vertex of type V.
    SmartGraphEdgeBase<E,V>
    Used as a super-type for all different concrete edge implementations by SmartGraphPanel, e.g., line and curves.
    SmartGraphVertex<V>
    Abstracts the internal representation and behavior of a visualized graph vertex.
    SmartLabelledNode
    A node to which a SmartLabel can be attached.
    SmartPlacementStrategy
    Contains the method that should be implemented when creating new vertex placement strategies.
    SmartStylableNode
    A stylable node can have its css properties changed at runtime.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SmartArrow
    A shape of an arrow to be attached to a SmartGraphEdge.
    SmartCircularSortedPlacementStrategy
    Places vertices around a circle, ordered by the underlying vertices element.toString() value.
    SmartGraphEdgeCurve<E,V>
    Concrete implementation of a curved edge.
    SmartGraphEdgeLine<E,V>
    Implementation of a straight line edge.
    SmartGraphPanel<V,E>
    JavaFX Pane that is capable of plotting a Graph or Digraph.
    SmartGraphProperties
    Properties used by SmartGraphPanel.
    SmartGraphVertexNode<T>
    Internal implementation of a graph vertex for the SmartGraphPanel class.
    SmartLabel
    A label contains text and can be attached to any SmartLabelledNode.
    SmartRandomPlacementStrategy
    Scatters the vertices randomly.
    UtilitiesBindings
    Some Math operations implemented as bindings.
    UtilitiesJavaFX
    Utility methods for JavaFX.
    UtilitiesPoint2D
    Class with utility methods for Point2D instances and force-based layout computations.
